Gift of Nature.name: Gift of Nature
descriptions: Increases Nature damage done by 2% and increases the effect of all healing spells and healing taken by 2%.
Increases Nature damage done by 4% and increases the effect of all healing spells and healing taken by 4%.
Increases Nature damage done by 6% and increases the effect of all healing spells and healing taken by 6%.
Increases Nature damage done by 8% and increases the effect of all healing spells and healing taken by 8%.
Increases Nature damage done by 10% and increases the effect of all healing spells and healing taken by 10%.

Improved Mark of the Wild.name: Improved Mark of the Wild
descriptions: Increases the effects of your Mark of the Wild and Gift of the Wild spells by 20% and reduces the chance listed spells will be dispelled by 30%.
Increases the effects of your Mark of the Wild and Gift of the Wild spells by 40% and reduces the chance listed spells will be dispelled by 60%.
Increases the effects of your Mark of the Wild and Gift of the Wild spells by 60% and reduces the chance listed spells will be dispelled by 90%.

Reflection.name: Reflection
descriptions: Allows 7% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting.
Allows 14% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting.
Allows 20% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting.

Omen of Clarity.name: Omen of Clarity
descriptions: Imbues the Druid with natural energy.  Each of the Druid's melee attacks has a chance to reduce the cost and cast time of your next damage or healing spell by $16870s1%.  Lasts dIndex=5.

Swiftbloom.name: Swiftbloom
descriptions: Reduces the global cooldown of your spells by 0.5 sec.

Swiftmend.name: Swiftmend
descriptions: Consumes a Rejuvenation or Regrowth effect on a friendly target to instantly heal them for an amount equal to 12 sec. of Rejuvenation or 18 sec. of Regrowth.

Improved Regrowth.name: Improved Regrowth
descriptions: Increases the critical effect chance of your Regrowth spell by 15%.
Increases the critical effect chance of your Regrowth spell by 30%.
Increases the critical effect chance of your Regrowth spell by 45%.
Increases the critical effect chance of your Regrowth spell by 60%.
Increases the critical effect chance of your Regrowth spell by 75%.

Animism.name: Animism
descriptions: Increases spell damage and healing by up to 10% of your total Spirit.
Increases spell damage and healing by up to 20% of your total Spirit.
Increases spell damage and healing by up to 30% of your total Spirit.
Increases spell damage and healing by up to 40% of your total Spirit.
Increases spell damage and healing by up to 50% of your total Spirit.

Catharsis.name: Catharsis
descriptions:
Reduces the Mana cost of your Soothe Animal, Hibernate, Remove Curse, Cure Poison, Abolish Poison, Rebirth and Revive spells by 15%.
In addition, your Innervate casts grants you a $34242d of Innervate effect.

Reduces the Mana cost of your Soothe Animal, Hibernate, Remove Curse, Cure Poison, Abolish Poison, Rebirth and Revive spells by 30%.
In addition, your Innervate casts grants you a $34243d of Innervate effect.

Reduces the Mana cost of your Soothe Animal, Hibernate, Remove Curse, Cure Poison, Abolish Poison, Rebirth and Revive spells by 45%.
In addition, your Innervate casts grants you a $34244d of Innervate effect.

Tranquil Spirit.name: Tranquil Spirit
descriptions: Reduces the mana cost of your Healing Touch and Tranquility spells by 3%. In addition, increases effect and reduces threat caused by Tranquility by 20%.
Reduces the mana cost of your Healing Touch and Tranquility spells by 6%. In addition, increases effect and reduces threat caused by Tranquility by 40%.
Reduces the mana cost of your Healing Touch and Tranquility spells by 9%. In addition, increases effect and reduces threat caused by Tranquility by 60%.
Reduces the mana cost of your Healing Touch and Tranquility spells by 12%. In addition, increases effect and reduces threat caused by Tranquility by 80%.
Reduces the mana cost of your Healing Touch and Tranquility spells by 15%. In addition, increases effect and reduces threat caused by Tranquility by 100%.

Nature's Swiftness.name: Nature's Swiftness
descriptions: When activated, your next spell becomes an instant cast spell.

Custody of the Nature.name: Custody of the Nature
descriptions: After being struck by a critical hit, you become immune to critical strikes for next $33999n $lattack:attacks; or $33999d. In addition, gives your spell effects additional 15% chance to resist dispel effects.

After being struck by a critical hit, you become immune to critical strikes for next $34000n $lattack:attacks; or $34000d. In addition, gives your spell effects additional 20% chance to resist dispel effects.

After being struck by a critical hit, you become immune to critical strikes for next $34001n $lattack:attacks; or $34001d. In addition, gives your spell effects additional 25% chance to resist dispel effects.

Improved Rejuvenation.name: Improved Rejuvenation
descriptions: Increases the effect of your Rejuvenation spell by 5%.
Increases the effect of your Rejuvenation spell by 10%.
Increases the effect of your Rejuvenation spell by 15%.

Improved Enrage.name: Improved Enrage
descriptions: The Enrage ability now instantly generates $/10;17080s1 Rage.
The Enrage ability now instantly generates $/10;17081s1 Rage.

Subtlety.name: Subtlety
descriptions: Reduces the threat you generate by 6% and increases the chance to avoid area of effect spells by an additional 6%.
Reduces the threat you generate by 12% and increases the chance to avoid area of effect spells by an additional 12%.
Reduces the threat you generate by 18% and increases the chance to avoid area of effect spells by an additional 18%.
Reduces the threat you generate by 24% and increases the chance to avoid area of effect spells by an additional 24%.
Reduces the threat you generate by 30% and increases the chance to avoid area of effect spells by an additional 30%.

Naturalist.name: Naturalist
descriptions: Reduces the cast time of your Healing Touch spell by 0.1 sec and increases your Mana regeneration by $34146s1% while in Cat or Bear Form.
Reduces the cast time of your Healing Touch spell by 0.2 sec and increases your Mana regeneration by $34147s1% while in Cat or Bear Form.
Reduces the cast time of your Healing Touch spell by 0.3 sec and increases your Mana regeneration by $34148s1% while in Cat or Bear Form.
Reduces the cast time of your Healing Touch spell by 0.4 sec and increases your Mana regeneration by $34149s1% while in Cat or Bear Form.
Reduces the cast time of your Healing Touch spell by 0.5 sec and increases your Mana regeneration by $34150s1% while in Cat or Bear Form.

Natural Shapeshifter.name: Natural Shapeshifter
descriptions: Reduces the mana cost of all shapeshifting by 10%.
Reduces the mana cost of all shapeshifting by 20%.
Reduces the mana cost of all shapeshifting by 30%.

Furor.name: Furor
descriptions: You gain $/10;17057s1 Rage when you shapeshift into Bear Form or $17099s1 Energy when you shapeshift into Cat Form. This effects can only occur once every $34200d.
You gain $/10;17057s1 Rage when you shapeshift into Bear Form or $17099s1 Energy when you shapeshift into Cat Form. This effects can only occur once every $34202d.

Nature's Focus.name: Nature's Focus
descriptions: Gives you a 15% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting.
Gives you a 30% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting.
Gives you a 45% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting.
Gives you a 60% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting.
Gives you a 75% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting.

Accuracy.name: Accuracy
descriptions: Increases your chance to hit with all attacks and spells by 1%.
Increases your chance to hit with all attacks and spells by 2%.
Increases your chance to hit with all attacks and spells by 3%.
